name: Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to reach the query endpoint. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Database Health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the database state is `critical`; `WARNING` if it is `maintenance`, `offline`, or `at-risk`; and `OK` otherwise.

name: Forest Health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the forest state is `critical`; `WARNING` if it is `maintenance`, `offline`, or `at-risk`; and `OK` otherwise.
